xwikidoc.title: IRC Archive for channel #phenotips on 20 May 2013
xwikidoc.content: <BogdanVancea1> has quit 04:26 <tishan> has joined #phenotips 04:40 <tishan> has quit 06:22 <BogdanVancea1> has quit 07:01 <tishan> has joined #phenotips 07:02 <tishan> Hi 07:41 <tishan> has quit 10:06 <tishan> has joined #phenotips 10:31 <tishan> Hi 10:33 <sdumitriu> Hi 10:34 <tishan> I came across that war download issue when building 10:42 <sdumitriu> Where does it stop? 10:43 <tishan> http://nexus.cs.toronto.edu/nexus/content/groups/public/org/xwiki/platform/xwiki-platform-web/4.5.3/xwiki-platform-web-4.5.3.war 10:44 <sdumitriu> Try to do a "git pull" 10:44 <sdumitriu> We've moved to 5.0.1 10:44 <tishan> ah ok 10:47 <tishan> I checked out from here 10:47 <tishan> https://github.com/compbio-UofT/phenotips 10:48 <tishan> git pull says file are up to date 10:48 <sdumitriu> OK 10:48 <sdumitriu> And it still fails at 4.5.3? 10:48 <tishan> yeah 10:49 <sdumitriu> If you edit pom.xml (the topmost one), what does it say for xwiki.version? 10:50 <tishan> 4.5.3 10:52 <sdumitriu> Then it can't be up to date... 10:52 <tishan> yup 10:53 <sdumitriu> What exactly does git pull say? 10:53 <tishan> just check the repo. there are updates before 3,4 days 10:53 <tishan> those changes cant be in local repo 10:54 <tishan> Already up-to-date. 10:54 <sdumitriu> Hm, wait 10:54 <sdumitriu> git remote -v 10:55 <tishan> ah got it got it 10:55 <tishan> i cloned from my fork 10:55 <tishan> Dumb! 10:55 <sdumitriu> git pull upstream 10:56 <sdumitriu> Or if you don't have that remote already, git remote add upstream https://github.com/compbio-UofT/phenotips.git 10:56 <sdumitriu> Then git pull upstream 10:56 <sdumitriu> Then git push origin 10:58 <tishan> master? 11:00 <sdumitriu> Yes 11:02 <tishan> Can we point me to some references to get familiar with groovy scripting for xwiki 11:03 <sdumitriu> You shouldn't need groovy 11:03 <sdumitriu> Velocity is enough 11:03 <tishan> I googled. But couldnt find adequate resources to understand existing code 11:03 <tishan> mmh 11:05 <sdumitriu> This might help: http://platform.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/SRD/Navigation?xpage=embed 11:09 <tishan> Ill be out for dinner and will be back shortly 12:24 <tishan> has quit 12:51 <tishan> has joined #phenotips 14:20 <tishan> has quit 17:20 <BogdanVancea> has quit
